title: Compliance Tracker
description: A full-featured CMMC / NIST 800-171 compliance tracker with live SSP preview, POAM tracking, pie chart dashboard, and evidence linking.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio site built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Features a dynamic timeline, dark mode, and responsive design.

title: Resume Builder Tool
description: Tool to generate downloadable DOCX resumes. Includes styling templates and field auto-population.

title: Cybersecurity Knowledgebase
description: A resource hub showcasing my expertise in encryption, auditing, compliance, and AI in security. Includes downloadable documents and certifications.

title: Interactive Timeline
description: An animated timeline of my professional history using CSS and JavaScript with scroll-based reveals and badge milestones.
